title: Better ways. Part 1. Introducing work study
creator_credit: James Carr, World Wide, British Productivity Council and Clifford Parris
brief_description: A survey of work study showing how it arises in response to the need to improve methods of work and how its “questioning technique”, carried out in full cooperation with all concerned - workers and maanagement alike - enables it to develop the improvements needed.
